name: Black Hole Void
description:
Welcome to Black Hole Void, the captivating game where you control the power of a black hole! Immerse yourself in a world full of excitement and challenges as you master the ultimate cosmic force.

In Black Hole Void, you take control of the black hole, and your task is to devour the city or districts as quickly as possible to achieve the highest high score. But that's not all - you can give your black hole a unique look with a variety of skins by changing the eye ring to different colors.

With a total of four different game modes, Black Hole Void offers a variety of challenges. In Time Mode, speed is key as you try to destroy the city or districts as quickly as possible to reach the top spot on the leaderboard. In Point Mode, the goal is to achieve as many points as possible without racing against the clock.

However, in Defense Mode, you become the protector of the city or districts by collecting upgrades to make your black hole stronger and larger, defending it against enemy attacks. And if that's not enough, there's the Defense Turn-Based Mode, which works similarly to Defense Mode but with additional challenges and boss battles.

But that's not all! Black Hole Void also features a leaderboard where you can compare your high scores and compete with other players. Are you ready to conquer the infinite depths of the universe and become the master of the black hole? Then venture into the darkness of Black Hole Void now!
